name: Michelle Abraham
what_you_do: The Dogs & Men Podcast explores the relationships between men and their dogs, focusing on self-love, relationships, dating, and personal growth through the lens of canine companionship.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves dog owners and individuals interested in personal development, particularly men looking to enhance their relationships and self-awareness.
business_focus: The Dogs & Men Podcast explores the relationships between men and their dogs, focusing on self-love, relationships, dating, and personal growth through the lens of canine companionship.
